answers.author: Jacob Foos
answers.text:
Check with the Ohio Municipal League or your state city manager association.  The Oklahoma Municipal League provides a salary survey document with a variety of municipal positions for each town/city which allows you to compare by population and other metrics.

author: [Anonymous]
text: What is the salary range in southwestern Ohio (Cincinnati/Dayton) for Township Administrator's?  Maybe 10k to 20k population and approximately $15M annual budget.  Or where is a resource to get that information?  Thank you.
title: Salary range Township Administrator
